title: 1. My Lord, make us establisher of prayer ..
description: My Lord, make me an establisher of prayer, and [many] from my descendants. Our Lord, and accept my supplication.

title: 2. Our Lord, accept from us ...
description: And [mention] when Abraham was raising the foundations of the House and [with him] Ishmael, [saying], Our Lord, accept [this] from us. Indeed You are the Hearing, the Knowing.

title: 3. Our Lord, give us in this world ...
description: Our Lord, give us in this world [that which is] good and in the Hereafter [that which is] good and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.

title: 4. Our Lord, pour upon us patience ...
description: Our Lord, pour upon us patience and plant firmly our feet and give us victory over the disbelieving people

title: 5. Our Lord, do not impose blame ...
description: Our Lord, do not impose blame upon us if we have forgotten or erred.

title: 6. Our Lord, and lay not upon us a burden ...
description: Our Lord, and lay not upon us a burden like that which You laid upon those before us

title: 7. Our Lord, and burden us not with that ...
description: Our Lord, and burden us not with that which we have no ability to bear. And pardon us; and forgive us; and have mercy upon us. You are our protector, so give us victory over the disbelieving people

title: 8. Our Lord, do not cause our hearts to swerve ...
description: Our Lord, do not cause our hearts to swerve after You have guided us, and bestow on us mercy from Your presence; You are the Giver

title: 9. God will never break His promise ...
description: Our Lord, You will gather the people for a Day in which there is no doubt.Indeed, Allah does not fail in His promise

title: 10. Our Lord, Forgive us our sins ...
description: Our Lord, we have believed, so forgive us our sins, and save us from the suffering of the Fire

title: 11. Our Lord, we have believed ...
description: Our Lord, we have believed in what You have revealed, and we have followed the Messenger, so count us among the witnesses

title: 12. Allah never break His promise
description: Our Lord, You will gather the people for a Day in which there is no doubt.Indeed, Allah does not fail in His promise

title: 13. Our Lord, we have believed
description: Our Lord, we have believed, so forgive us our sins, and save us from the suffering of the Fire

title: 14. Our Lord, we have believed
description: Our Lord, we have believed in what You have revealed, and we have followed the Messenger, so count us among the witnesses
